original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged down in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index (ASPI) was down 0.37 percent or 34.06 points to 9,245.13, while the most liquid index was down 0.15 percent or 3.96 points to 2,714.26.
The turnover generated during 1200 hours was 665 million rupees.
Top losers during mid day trade Hatton National Bank, Commercial Bank and Expolanka. (Colombo/April21/2023)
